programme.title: The Devil's Rain
programme.desc: A murdered family's patriarch seeks revenge upon an Arizona coven that captures souls and worships Satan.

programme.title: The Dark and the Wicked
programme.desc: Plagued by waking nightmares, two siblings suspect that something evil is taking over their family at an isolated farmhouse.

programme.title: Sequence Break
programme.desc: A reclusive video arcade technician experiences bizarre biomechanical mutations and hallucinations when a mysterious new arcade machine appears in his shop.

programme.title: PG: Psycho Goreman
programme.desc: Intergalactic assassins converge on a small town after two siblings unwittingly resurrect an ancient alien overlord.

programme.title: Vicious Fun
programme.desc: A horror film critic finds himself in a sticky situation when he stumbles into a self-help group for serial killers.

programme.title: Boar
programme.desc: In the beautiful, yet harsh Australian outback lives an animal of staggering size with a ferocious, driving need for blood and destruction. It defends its territory with savage force and kills with a raw, animalistic brutality not seen before.

programme.title: Revealer
programme.desc: A stripper and a religious protester are trapped together in a peep show booth and must come together to survive the apocalypse.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Two hired guns who are commissioned to rescue an imprisoned scientist from a secret facility are hunted down by a terrifying creature of unknown origin.

programme.title: Sissy
programme.desc: High school best friends Cecilia and Emma run into each other after a decade, and Emma invites Cecilia on a weekend away. Stuck in a remote cabin with her high school bully, Cecilia quickly develops a taste for revenge.

programme.title: All Hallows' Eve 2
programme.desc: A woman finds a VHS tape that shows a series of gruesome tales.

programme.title: All Hallows' Eve 2
programme.desc: A woman finds a VHS tape that shows a series of gruesome tales.

programme.title: Party Hard Die Young
programme.desc: A fun vacation quickly turns into a nightmare for a group of friends visiting Croatia.

programme.title: Slaxx
programme.desc: A possessed pair of jeans terrorizes trapped workers at a trendy clothing store.

programme.title: The Sadness
programme.desc: As Taiwan succumbs to a viral pandemic that transforms peaceful citizens into sadistic, bloodthirsty maniacs, a young couple must battle to be reunited before they too become infected.

programme.title: Saloum
programme.desc: Shot down after fleeing a coup and extracting a drug lord from Guinea-Bissau, a group of mercenaries must lie low at a remote holiday camp, stash their stolen haul, and repair their plane to escape back to Dakar, Senegal.
